document_data.name: Halandar Hardingdale
document_data.mainbody:
'''Halander Hardingdale''', also known as '''Ratshadow''', was a young [[halfling]] from [[Baldur's Gate]]. Due to some trouble with certain associates, he and his family had to flee to [[Waterdeep]]. While there he joined the [[Zhentarim]], who relocated him to [[Ten Towns]].

{{Quote|A true friend is worth her weight in gold.|Halander "Rashadow" Hardingdale.}}
document_data.Personality:
Halander absolutely hated [[cat]]s,

He had a nervous tic that he always stuttered whenever he felt nervous or anxious.
document_data.Activities: On numerous occasion, Halander would buy toy dolls and send them off to his niece in Waterdeep.

History.Early Life:
Born Halander Hardingdale, "Ratshadow" gained his moniker as a youth by "shadowing" the [[Rivington Rats]] gang. He made certain contacts within other gangs which brought down the wrath of the Rivington Rats. He evacuated his mother and sisters to Waterdeep where he later joined them. However before leaving his hideaway in the [[Undercellar]] of Baldur's Gate, he stole a magic pouch from the kingpin known as the [[Fetcher]].

Reuniting his family in Waterdeep, Ratshadow joined the Zhentarim as a front man. They felt his skill at making contacts could be used elsewhere and sent him North to Ten Towns to help establish the Black Network as a regional power.
History.Tyranny of Dragons:
[[File:Ratshadow.png|thumb|right|250px|Halander, stealing the ''White Dragon Mask'' from the [[Cult of the Dragon]].]]
In the 1480s [[DR]],{{ToD-time}} Ratshadow joined a group of [[adventurer]]s in [[Icewind Dale]] on a mission to stop the ''[[Cult of the Dragon]]'' from retrieving an item they required to summon their [[Tiamat|Dragon Queen]] to the Realms, the ''[[Red Dragon Mask]]''.{{Cite web/Tyranny of Dragons: Online Comic 1}} He remained with the group for some time, accompanying them to the isle of [[Tuern]]{{Cite web/Tyranny of Dragons: Online Comic 3}} and the city of [[Neverwinter]] in their ongoing pursuit of the cult. It was while in Neverwinter that Ratshadow saw his opportunity to give the Zhentarim an edge. As the cult's [[dragon]] allies descended upon Neverwinter, he stole the ''[[White Dragon Mask]]''{{Cite web/Tyranny of Dragons: Online Comic 6}} and stashed it away at the [[Ulbrinter Villa]]. Unfortunately for Lord [[Arthagast Ulbrinter]], cult agents broke into the noble manor,{{Cite web/Tyranny of Dragons: Online Comic 7}} and eventually killed the nobleman.{{Cite web/Tyranny of Dragons: Online Comic 8}}
